mapper.select: select ciNo, ciName, ciUrl, ciPort, ciDatabase, ciUser ,ciPwd, ciEtc, ciNo as id, ciName as text, uiId from connection_info where uiId = #{uiId}
select ciNo, ciName, ciUrl, ciPort, ciDatabase, ciUser ,ciPwd, ciEtc, ciNo as id, ciName as text, uiId from connection_info where ciNo = #{ciNo}
mapper.insert: insert into connection_info(ciName, ciUrl, ciPort, ciDatabase, ciUser ,ciPwd, ciEtc, uiId) values(#{ciName},#{ciUrl},#{ciPort},#{ciDatabase},#{ciUser}, #{ciPwd},#{ciEtc}, #{uiId})
mapper.select: select table_name as tableName, table_comment as tableComment, (data_length+index_length)/1024 as tableSize from information_schema.tables where table_schema=#{dbName} and (table_type='BASE TABLE' or table_type='SYSTEM VIEW');
